title: Starting a RANKED Team!
body:
Hi first of all I'm looking to start a ranked team for some fun and just to see how we go and build our skills together.

**ABOUT ME:**
I've only just become ranked and am currently BRONZE 3 
ROLES - JUNGLE/MID/SUPPORT/TOP/ADC (in that order)
I intend to play jungle or mid for this team so if i could find people that want to take over the other rolls that would be awesome!

**CHAMPS I PLAY:**
Jungle:
{{champion:5}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:33}} 
Mid:
{{champion:103}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:1}} 

**REQUIREMENTS:**
Gotta be able to play a particular roll you feel confident at
Cant be negative and blame team for losses we will win as a team and we will loose as a team
Gotta want to have FUN!

If you are interested then please feel free to add me and shoot me a message saying you want to be a part of the team

Add me: **BlueMoonBandit**

replies.body: Hi just turned level 30 not long ago havent started playing ranked yet. I main ADC, support and top. im an ok jungler and mid also. Just looking for a team to rank with and have fun with.

Hey! Support main here however I can also ADC or mid if need be but am most proficient at support can play many Champs well but am very proficient at Janna, my pool varies from as i said Janna, Nami, Leona, Nautilus, Thresh, Blitscrank and Morgana, Add me in game if keen! :)

Hi there!

I've just hit level 30 (after a year an a half of struggle) a couple of months ago, and it would be awesome to experience ranked with you guys!
As you can see, I don't play very often, but never the less, sign me up please! :D

-Anserem
(By the way, it'd be great if I could go top or support if that's all g)
